description: Gentoo's multi-purpose configuration and management tool. It consists of various modules that take care of individual administrative tasks. Some subcommands such as kernel, locale, profile, etc. have their own usage documentation. More information: https://wiki.gentoo.org/wiki/Eselect.

useCases.description: Display a list of installed modules:
